entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Oxbow
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 01:16 AM CST Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Fog dissipating. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Fog dissipating this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 26 March 2023
